original_title: マシュランボー劇場版-セーラームーン
overview: The story follows the human girl Yakumo, who awakens from cryogenic sleep in a devastated world destroyed by genetically engineered lifeforms, Enterrans. With the help of a few friendly Enterrans, she goes on a journey to find more human survivors and bring peace between the two factions.
title: Mushrambo: Kokoro wo Chikara ni
